author: Ryan McQuilkin
comment: Can't change the default settings on the watch face. Settings lock up whenever I try to open them. Emailed the creator about it and have not gotten a response. Looks cool but settings is a big deal.  *Edit Settings do work through Android Wear app as creator suggested. I was having issues with wear app as well but after an update it's working much better and I'm able to change settings. Thanks.

reply.author: Anthony Stéphan
reply.content:
Hi Ryan, I've never received your email :(
You can change the settings from Android Wear app from your smartphone ;)

author: Alice Blake
comment: Have enough custom options to really make look the way you want and I love this watch face

author: Peter Gallacher
comment: Pretty cool, I'm usually switching watch faces every few days, but I have to say this ones really grabbed a lot of screen time for me due to its simplicity.

reply.author: Anthony Stéphan
reply.content:
Hi Peter, glad to read your comment! Thank you! 
Anthony

title: It works well, it looks just as shown.

author: Ethen Parker
comment: This is honestly the best watch face I've used so far, which is saying a lot because I've had my smart watch for well over a year, and I change the face almost 3 times every week. I have been using this face for almost a week now and am very satisfied with it, its features are useful and the design is sleek. It's especially cool to me because I do hobby electronics and it remindes me of that one board for the raspberry pi.

reply.author: Anthony Stéphan
reply.content:
Hi Ethen,
Thanks a lot for your comment :) I'm so glad to see Pixels Watch Face matching your expectations!
Anthony

title: Favorite watch face!

author: Andrei Gheorghe
comment: Don't get me wrong, it's a great job well done but I would add more features like battery percentage or the option to not have the date in dim mode.

reply.author: Anthony Stéphan
reply.content:
Hi Andrei, battery percentage will come in the next release, keep updated ;) 
Anthony

title: I really enjoy your watchface but it's not perfect
